topic: Man catches fire from power bank at Melbourne airport business lounge

ideas.title: Powerbank Inferno: Essendon Edition
ideas.premise: A man resembling a passionate Essendon supporter spontaneously combusts in the Melbourne Airport lounge after his power bank overheats while charging his phone, which is streaming a replay of their latest loss.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Melbourne sports frustration meets literal combustion; Essendon's perpetual disappointment.

ideas.title: Qantas Frequent Flyer Meltdown
ideas.premise: A frazzled Qantas frequent flyer, already stressed by flight delays, is engulfed in flames when his dodgy power bank explodes, symbolizing his burning rage at the airline's service.
ideas.why_funny: Satirizes Qantas's recent issues with delays and customer service in a fiery way.

ideas.title: The Quantum Leap of Faith
ideas.premise: A scientist from Quantum Brilliance accidentally creates a miniature black hole while trying to charge his phone with a quantum-powered power bank, sucking the Melbourne Airport business lounge into another dimension.
ideas.why_funny: Combines real Melbourne tech with absurd sci-fi; quantum physics gone wrong.

ideas.title: Oaks Day Spark
ideas.premise: A racegoer, fresh from a dramatic Oaks Day and sporting a questionable outfit, sets himself alight with a faulty power bank while trying to take a selfie, adding to the day's chaos.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at Melbourne's racing culture and fashion disasters with a literal spark.

ideas.title: The Great Southern Stand-by
ideas.premise: Stranded travellers at Melbourne Airport huddle around a single working power outlet, only for it to explode in a shower of sparks when a man plugs in his dodgy power bank, leaving everyone in the dark.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerates the frustration of travel delays with a darkly comedic power outage.
